ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Consideration
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount of consideration received or receivable for the disposal of assets and liabilities, including discontinued operation.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

InterestAndDebtExpense.label: Interest and Debt Expense
InterestAndDebtExpense.description: Interest and debt related expenses associated with nonoperating financing activities of the entity.

LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.label: Line of Credit Facility, Fair Value of Amount Outstanding
LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.description: Fair value of the amount outstanding under the credit facility.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RestructuringReserveSettledWithoutCash2.label: Restructuring Reserve, Settled without Cash
RestructuringReserveSettledWithoutCash2.description: Amount of decrease in the reserve for full or partial settlement through consideration other than cash.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedT.label: Business Combination, Separately Recognized Transactions, Liabilities Recognized
BusinessCombinationSeparatelyRecognizedT.description: The amount of liabilities recognized recorded in a transaction with the acquiree for each transaction that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in the business combination.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate During Period
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateDuringPe.description: The effective interest rate during the reporting period.

LinesOfCreditFairValueDisclosure.label: Lines of Credit, Fair Value Disclosure
LinesOfCreditFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of contractual arrangement with a lender under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsS.label: Transfer of Financial Assets Accounted for as Sales, Fair Value of Derecognized Assets
TransferOfFinancialAssetsAccountedForAsS.description: Fair value of derecognized financial assets from transactions which comprise an initial transfer and an agreement entered into in contemplation of the initial transfer resulting in retention of substantially all of the exposure to the economic return throughout the term of the transaction.
